Firefox.Description: firefox is an open-source web browser that is fast and private.

Brave.Description: Brave is a web browser that is fast and private.

Kiwi.Description: Kiwi is based on Chromium with many features.

ProtonMail.Description: Proton Mail is an end-to-end encrypted email service.

FairMail.Description: Fully featured, privacy oriented email app for Android.

K9.Description: K-9 Mail is free and open source email client for Android.

Mixplorer.Description: MiXplorer is the best Android file explorer.

Google Docs.Description: Google Docs is an online word processor.

Google Sheets.Description: Google Sheets is an online spreadsheet application.

SD Maid SE.Description: SD Maid 2/SE is Android's most thorough cleaning tool.

MEGA.Description: MEGA is a cloud storage and file hosting service.

Waze.Description: Waze is a community driven navigation app.

Moovit.Description: Moovit is a mobility as a service provider and journey planner app.

Youtube.Description: Youtube is an online video sharing and social media platform.

NewPipe.Description: An intuitive, feature-rich and privacy friendly app for YouTube.

ViMusic.Description: An Android application for streaming music from YouTube Music.

Poweramp.Description: Poweramp is a powerful music player for Android.

VLC.Description: VLC is FOSS cross-platform multimedia player and framework.

Whatsapp.Description: WhatsApp is a centralized instant messaging application.

Infinity For Reddit.Description: Infinity is a beautiful, feature-rich app that offers a smooth Reddit browsing experience.

Telegram.Description: Telegram is a cloud-based and centralized instant messaging service.

Discord.Description: Discord is an instant messaging and VoIP social platform.

The Dise Instagram Mode.Description: IG mod with many features such as ads-free experience and media downloader.

AFWall+.Description: AFWall+ is an iptables based firewall for Android.

Netguard.Description: NetGuard provides simple and advanced ways to block access to the internet - no root required.

AdAway.Description: AdAway is a free and open-source ad-blocking application for the Android mobile operating.

ReThink.Description: Block malware, spyware, ads, and trackers across all apps with Rethink DNS.

Scrambled Exif.Description: Remove the metadata from your pictures before sharing them.

QR Code.Description: QR and barcode scanner with all the features you need.

Steam.Description: With the free Steam Mobile App, you can take Steam with you anywhere.

Syncthing.Description: Open, trustworthy and decentralized file synchronization.

F-Droid.Description: F-Droid is an installable catalogue of FOSS applications for the Android platform.

Aurora Store.Description: An open-source alternative to Google Play Store with privacy and modern design.

Aurora Droid.Description: An alternative to the default F-Droid app.

Aniyomi.Description: Unofficial fork of Tachiyomi for anime.

Tachiyomi.Description: Free and open source manga reader for Android.

Moelist.Description: MoeList is an unofficial MAL (MyAnimeList) client.

Saikou.Description: An Android Anilist client, which lets you stream & download Anime & Manga.
